titleStmt.title:
Order to Sell Cherokee Lands
1836 Dec 24

publicationStmt.publisher: The University of Tennessee Libraries Digital Initiatives

availability.p: The copyright interests in this collection remain with the creator. For more information, contact the Special Collections Library.

bibl.title: Order to Sell Cherokee Lands 1836 Dec 24
bibl.note: William Holland Thomas and James Robert Thomas Collection

projectDesc.p: Machine-readable transcription created for the University of Tennessee Libraries Special Collections.

editorialDecl.p: Errors in transcription of the printed text not controlled.
Editorial tags limited to gap and unclear.
Catchwords and directional notes such as "turn page over" have been omitted.

keywords.term: Confederate States of America. Army -- Biography.
Soldiers -- Confederate States of America -- Biography.

revisionDesc.change: Approximate date of original transcription and transcriber.
Migrating from P4 to validated TEI P5.

div.p: In Pursuance of an order of the County Court of said County directing the made in what the surveyed Cherokee Ladns (Granted to said County by an act of the General Assembly Passed one Thousand Eight Hundred Thirty-five) are to be sold I do hereby certify that William Thomas Became the Purchaser of Lott no 94 District no 1 Containing fifty acres of third Quality Signed by order of Court
